      • manageTopology

        public void manageTopology()
                    throws TopologyRuntimeManagementException,
                           TManagerException,
                           PackingException
        Manager a topology 1. Instantiate necessary resources 2. Valid whether the runtime management is legal 3. Complete the runtime management for a specific command
        Throws:
        TopologyRuntimeManagementException
        TManagerException
        PackingException

      • validateRuntimeManage

        protected boolean validateRuntimeManage​(SchedulerStateManagerAdaptor adaptor,
                                        java.lang.String topologyName)
                                 throws TopologyRuntimeManagementException
        Before continuing to the action logic, verify: - the topology is running - the information in execution state matches the request There is an edge case that the topology data could be only partially available, which could be caused by not fully successful SUBMIT or KILL command. In this case, we need to skip the validation and allow KILL command to go through. In case execution state data is available, environment check will be done anyway.
        Returns:
        true if the topology execution data is found, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        TopologyRuntimeManagementException

      • validateExecutionState
